name: Egg Run (DinosGamesStudio)
description:
this is a game where you have to jump over the red spikes and get a high score. jump the spikes for as long as you can without dying.

controls:

press R to restart the game at any time

press the space bar to jump.

Mobile Controls:

tap the screan to jump

tap the screan with 2 fingers to restart the game at any time.
